title: Diagram of electric field between two plates

content.question: The diagram above shows the electric field lines due to two charged parallel metal plates. X, Y, and Z are locations where charges may be placed. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: The left plate is positive and the right plate is negative.
A negative charge at X experiences a greater force than if it were placed at Y.
A positive charge at X experiences less force than if it were placed at Y.
A negative charge at X experiences less force than if it were placed at Z.
A positive charge at X would experience the same force if it were placed at Z.

content.answer: A positive charge at X would experience the same force if it were placed at Z.

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
